awakePIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for awake pic in .awake command.

helpPIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for Help pic .help command.

pingPIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for PING pic in .ping command.

ALIVE_EMOJI.description: Put here any emoji. Which Will be Show When U Do .alive.

BIO_MSG.description: Put Your Telegram Bio Here Required For Auto Bio.

pmpermitPIC.description: Put here any telegraph media link for custom pmpermit pic.

pmpermitFLOOD.description: Now you can set custom flood in PM by default it is 5

loggerID.description: Create a private channel. And get it's id from @missrose_bot and paste here. Value should start with -100

apiID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting Others Value may result In Account Ban.

sudoACCESS.description: Enter your friends user id to to give him bot full access

sudoHANDLER.description: Please enter sudo user command handler

commandHANDLER.description: You can change your command handler by default it is (.)

apiHASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting Others Value May result In Account Ban.

pluginCHANNEL.description: Copy Group Id And paste here To Get Plugin Channel ID copy and paste here

herokuAPI.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

herokuAPPname.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

botTOKEN.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the token of your bot. And Don't Forget To Turn on inline Mode on bot settings. Get it.

botUSERNAME.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at @BotFather and copy the username of your bot.

helpBUTTONS.description: Set The Amount Of Buttons Displayed In help Command default 7

helpCOLUMNS.description: Set The Amount Of Rows You Want To Displayed In legend Command default 2

help1EMOJI.description: Set The emojies You Want to Add In Help Command!!

help2EMOJI.description: Set The emojies You Want to Add In Help Command!!

pmPERMIT.description: Type DISABLE if you want to disable pm protection...
